description: I contributed to the development of a streaming platform specializing in live concerts, where I developed their website and content management system (CMS) using React. Additionally, I worked on their TV applications tailored for Android TV and Apple TV, utilizing React Native. I had the privilege of learning Stripe for handling payments, including subscriptions and more.

I was responsible for a carpet warehouse and led a team of two people. My responsibilities included managing inventory and ensuring that our products were always ready for upcoming events and deliveries.
